TopicTitle: Question from a non-coder to create a shell for large vessels that reduces part count.

Articles.Content:
I've been noodling on an idea. Would it be possible to make a mod that covers all the parts of a ship (like in Children of Dead Earth) in a metal skin. Instead of armor as in CoaDE it would reduce the part count (anything underneath would become a wireframe or something). Maybe it could be armor too.

Thoughts on feasibility?
